item.description:
(((SINGS))) GET YOUR MOTOR RUNNING HEAD ON OUT TO HONEY DEW, LOOKING FOR ADVENTURE IN WHAT EVER COMES OUR WAY.. BORN TO BE WILD,,,

This ride to newport will begin at Honey Dew cawfee shop on RT 123 in Norton. Meet at 9:30 leave at 10.
This ride will take back roads to Newport. We will stop at a sea food shack for lunch. They also have other things besides seafood.
Then we will go thru Newport and down ocean drive ending up at the end of the day with ice cream.
How long of a ride you ask .. Well girls you know how we like to gab; all I can say is that you will be home before dark.
There also will be a few scenic pit stops for photos and fun.
This ride can be a non expensive one for those out of work.. You can get 3 clam cake's, chowder and a soda for $5..A hot dog or CLAMS that I must say are scrumcious!! Price's range yet price's are worth the feast!~
So If you want to go Be at Honey Dew all greased up with your sun screen and lets have some fun..
See you there.. Rambling Rebellious ROBIN
item.name: Newport Ride
